DOC.detailed_description: This extension study participant complete study 211LE201 ( NCT01499355 ) Week 52 discontinue BIIB023 placebo . Eligible participant Study 211LE201 follow 108 week . Participants receive BIIB023 low dose high dose 211LE201 continue receive dosing study ( 211LE202 ; NCT01930890 ) addition background therapy . Participants receive placebo 211LE201 randomize receive either BIIB023 low dose high dose addition background therapy .
